  3. 1. The History of the Life of Ajamila
  4. 2. Ajamila Delivered by the Visnudutas
  5. 3. Yamaraja Instructs His Messengers
  6. 4. The Hamsa-guhya Prayers Offered to the Lord by Prajapati Daksa
  7. 5. Narada Muni Cursed by Prajapati Daksa
  8. 6. The Progeny of the Daughters of Dakṣa
  9. 7. Indra Offends His Spiritual Master, Bṛhaspati
  10. 8. The Nārāyaṇa-kavaca Shield
  11. 9. Appearance of the Demon Vṛtrāsura
  12. 10. The Battle Between the Demigods and Vṛtrāsura
  13. 11. The Transcendental Qualities of Vṛtrāsura
  14. 12. Vṛtrāsura’s Glorious Death
  15. 13. King Indra Afflicted by Sinful Reaction
  16. 14. King Citraketu’s Lamentation
  17. 15. The Saints Narada and Angira Instruct King Citraketu
  18. 16. King Citraketu Meets the Supreme Lord
  19. 17. Mother Parvati Curses Citraketu
  20. 18. Diti Vows to Kill King Indra
  21. 19. Performing the Puṁsavana Ritualistic Ceremony

Sixth Canto - Prescribed Duties for Mankind

    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">

    <!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="highlight.css">

<body class="rust">
    <!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var path_to_root = "";
        var default_theme = "rust";
    </script>

    <!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        try {
            var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
            var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

            if (theme.startsWith('"') && theme.endsWith('"')) {
                localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
            }

            if (sidebar.startsWith('"') && sidebar.endsWith('"')) {
                localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
            }
        } catch (e) { }
    </script>

    <!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var theme;
        try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
        if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
        document.body.className = theme;
        document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
    </script>

    <!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        var html = document.querySelector('html');
        var sidebar = 'hidden';
        if (document.body.clientWidth >= 1080) {
            try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
            sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
        }
        html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
        html.classList.add("sidebar-" + sidebar);
    </script>

    <nav id="sidebar" class="sidebar" aria-label="Table of contents">
        <div class="sidebar-scrollbox">

            <!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM -->
            <script type="text/javascript">
                document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
                document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
                Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
                    link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
                });
            </script>

            <div id="content" class="content">

<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

        if (theme.startsWith('&quot;') &amp;&amp; theme.endsWith('&quot;')) {
            localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
        }

        if (sidebar.startsWith('&quot;') &amp;&amp; sidebar.endsWith('&quot;')) {
            localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
        }
    } catch (e) { }
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    var theme;
    try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
    if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
    document.body.className = theme;
    document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    var html = document.querySelector('html');
    var sidebar = 'hidden';
    if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
        try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
        sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
    }
    html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
    html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

        &lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&gt;
        &lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
            document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
            document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
            Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {

    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

    if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
    }
} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;

The Supreme Character of Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; The Discussion Between Jada Bharata and Maharaja Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Movements of the Sun&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Orbits of the Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt;             &amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;quot;menu-title&amp;quot;&amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;lt;/h1&amp;gt;

            &amp;lt;div class=&amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

        &amp;lt;/form&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;div id=&amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;quot;&amp;gt;

        &amp;lt;/div&amp;gt;

    &amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;gt;
    &amp;lt;script type=&amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
        document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
        Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
            link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
        });
    &amp;lt;/script&amp;gt;

    &amp;lt;div id=&amp;quot;content&amp;quot; class=&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;&amp;gt;
        &amp;lt;main&amp;gt;
            &amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Movements of the Sun&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Orbits of the Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sisumara Planetary Systems&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; The Subterranean Heavenly Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of Lord Ananta&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Hellish Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;

    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
            
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;gt;
            
        &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

    &amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
    document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
    Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
        link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
    });
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

    <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type">
    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/general.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/chrome.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        
    &amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;

    &amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;gt;

    &amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        
    &amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

Home - Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus

    <meta name="description" content="">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt;                 &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
    
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});

<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->

&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;

Rsabhadeva’s Appearance in the Womb of Merudevi, the Wife of King Nabhi&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;4/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;4.&lt;/strong&gt; The Characteristics of Rsabhadeva, the Supreme Personality of Godhead&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;5/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;5.&lt;/strong&gt; Lord Rsabhadeva’s Teachings to His Sons&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;6/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;6.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of Lord Rsabhadeva&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;7/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;7.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of King Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;8/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;8.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Character of Bharata Maharaja&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;9/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;9.&lt;/strong&gt; The Supreme Character of Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; The Discussion Between Jada Bharata and Maharaja Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt;             &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;
&lt;ol class=&quot;chapter&quot;&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;../../index.html&quot; class=&quot;active&quot;&gt;Home&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li class=&quot;affix&quot;&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;index.html&quot;&gt;Table of Contents&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;1/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;1.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of Maharaja Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;2/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;2.&lt;/strong&gt; The Activities of Maharaja Agnidhra&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;3/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;3.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; The Movements of the Sun&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;22/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;22.&lt;/strong&gt; The Orbits of the Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;23/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;23.&lt;/strong&gt; The Sisumara Planetary Systems&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;24/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;24.&lt;/strong&gt; The Subterranean Heavenly Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;25/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;25.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of Lord Ananta&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;26/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;26.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Hellish Planets&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ol&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;

    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

&lt;link rel=&quot;shortcut icon&quot; href=&quot;favicon.png&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;css/variables.css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Fonts --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro:500&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;highlight.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;tomorrow-night.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;ayu-highlight.css&quot;&gt;


&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;

&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
    &amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;menu-bar-sticky-container&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;quot;left-buttons&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Toggle Table of Contents&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;sidebar&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-bars&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-toggle&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Change theme&amp;amp;quot; aria-haspopup=&amp;amp;quot;true&amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;quot;fa fa-paint-brush&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;theme-list&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme-popup&amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;quot;Themes&amp;amp;quot; role=&amp;amp;quot;menu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;ayu&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Ayu&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search. (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
            &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;ul id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});
&amp;amp;lt;/script&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;content&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;main&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;!DOCTYPE HTML&amp;amp;gt;

    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff" />

&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;FontAwesome/css/font-awesome.css&quot;&gt;
&lt;link href=&quot;https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800&quot; rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; type=&quot;text/css&quot;&gt;

&lt;!-- Highlight.js Stylesheets --&gt;

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;

                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;light&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Light&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;rust&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Rust (default)&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;coal&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Coal&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;
                &amp;amp;lt;li role=&amp;amp;quot;none&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;button role=&amp;amp;quot;menuitem&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;theme&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;navy&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;Navy&amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;lt;/li&amp;amp;gt;

            &amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;

        &amp;amp;amp;lt;button id=&amp;amp;amp;quot;search-toggle&amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;icon-button&amp;amp;amp;quot; type=&amp;amp;amp;quot;button&amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Search.             &amp;amp;amp;lt;i class=&amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-search&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;gt;
        &amp;amp;amp;lt;/button&amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;h1 class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;menu-title&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;Fifth Canto - The Creative Impteus&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/h1&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;div class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;right-buttons&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;a href=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print.html&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; title=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;Print this book&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;i id=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;print-button&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;fa fa-print&amp;amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/i&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;amp;amp;lt;/a&amp;amp;amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;amp;gt;



&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;search-wrapper&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;form id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar-outer&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;input type=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;search&amp;amp;quot; id=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; name=&amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;quot; placeholder=&amp;amp;quot;Search this book ...&amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; aria-describedby=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-header&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/form&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;div id=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer&amp;amp;quot; class=&amp;amp;quot;searchresults-outer hidden&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;

&amp;amp;lt;/ul&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;/div&amp;amp;gt;


&amp;amp;lt;!-- Apply ARIA attributes after the sidebar and the sidebar toggle button are added to the DOM --&amp;amp;gt;
&amp;amp;lt;script type=&amp;amp;quot;text/javascript&amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;gt;
document.getElementById('sidebar-toggle').setAttribute('aria-expanded', sidebar === 'visible');
document.getElementById('sidebar').setAttribute('aria-hidden', sidebar !== 'visible');
Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('#sidebar a')).forEach(function(link) {
link.setAttribute('tabIndex', sidebar === 'visible' ? 0 : -1);
});

&lt;!-- Custom theme stylesheets --&gt;


&lt;link rel=&quot;stylesheet&quot; href=&quot;custom.css&quot;&gt;



</head>
<body class="rust">
<!-- Provide site root to javascript -->
<script type="text/javascript">
var path_to_root = "";
var default_theme = "rust";
</script>


&lt;!-- Work around some values being stored in localStorage wrapped in quotes --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
    try {
        var theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme');
        var sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar');

    if (theme.startsWith('&amp;quot;') &amp;amp;&amp;amp; theme.endsWith('&amp;quot;')) {
        localStorage.setItem('mdbook-theme', theme.slice(1, theme.length - 1));
    }

if (sidebar.startsWith('&amp;amp;quot;') &amp;amp;amp;&amp;amp;amp; sidebar.endsWith('&amp;amp;quot;')) {
    localStorage.setItem('mdbook-sidebar', sidebar.slice(1, sidebar.length - 1));
}



} catch (e) { }



&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Set the theme before any content is loaded, prevents flash --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var theme;
try { theme = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-theme'); } catch(e) { }
if (theme === null || theme === undefined) { theme = default_theme; }
document.body.className = theme;
document.querySelector('html').className = theme + ' js';
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- Hide / unhide sidebar before it is displayed --&gt;
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot;&gt;
var html = document.querySelector('html');
var sidebar = 'hidden';
if (document.body.clientWidth &gt;= 1080) {
try { sidebar = localStorage.getItem('mdbook-sidebar'); } catch(e) { }
sidebar = sidebar || 'visible';
}
html.classList.remove('sidebar-visible');
html.classList.add(&quot;sidebar-&quot; + sidebar);
&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;nav id=&quot;sidebar&quot; class=&quot;sidebar&quot; aria-label=&quot;Table of contents&quot;&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;sidebar-scrollbox&quot;&gt;

The Supreme Character of Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;10/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;10.&lt;/strong&gt; The Discussion Between Jada Bharata and Maharaja Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;11/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;11.&lt;/strong&gt; Jada Bharata Instructs King Rahugana&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;12/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;12.&lt;/strong&gt; The Conversation Between Maharaja Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;13/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;13.&lt;/strong&gt; Further Talks Between King Rahugana and Jada Bharata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;14/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;14.&lt;/strong&gt; The Material World as the Great Forest of Enjoyment&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;15/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;15.&lt;/strong&gt; The Glories of the Descendants of King Priyavrata&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;16/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;16.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;17/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;17.&lt;/strong&gt; The Descent of the River Ganges&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;18/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;18.&lt;/strong&gt; The Prayers Offered to the Lord by the Residents of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;19/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;19.&lt;/strong&gt; A Description of the Island of Jambudvipa&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;20/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;20.&lt;/strong&gt; Studying the Structure of the Universe&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;21/index.html&quot;&gt;&lt;strong aria-hidden=&quot;true&quot;&gt;21.&lt;/strong&gt; (Shortkey: s)&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-label=&amp;amp;amp;quot;Toggle Searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-expanded=&amp;amp;amp;quot;false&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-keyshortcuts=&amp;amp;amp;quot;S&amp;amp;amp;quot; aria-controls=&amp;amp;amp;quot;searchbar&amp;amp;amp;quot;&amp;amp;amp;gt;
